column2: A Quiet Front
[From.GetBestName] died in battle, sad...
All was quiet on the western front, uh?
One death is a tragedy, two thousands a statistic.
It is just as much a matter of chance that I am still alive as that I might have been hit.
Death is not an adventure to those who stand face to face with it.
Beauty and the Beast
Rumors about the beast, peasant wants his dauther back...
Just the job for me!
I could try to find it...
I'm happy without observing legendary beasts.
Stupid peasants and their stupid problems!
You will begin to search for the castle of the Beast.
Greedy old man wants gold to tell you the way...
Take my gold and lead me!
Oh, I'm sure you will tell me...
Telling me the way would save a girl.
I can't afford something like this right now.
The old man will lead you to the castle.
Spent days searching, no result...
I will find it, because I want to find it.
Putting in a little more effort can't hurt.
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap], show me the way!
Unfourtunate.
You will continue to search.
Spent even more days searching, still no result...
All these effort for nothing.
Arrived at the castle, still outside...
And finally, we will meet.
There must be another door to this building...
This is my last chance to leave...
You will enter the castle.
You will sneak into the castle.
Sneak in, see the beast, but he don't see you...
He doens't expect me now...
This creature is harmless, I shall spare it.
You will attack the Beast.
Just went inside, beast try to explain...
What's the matter, Beast, too kind and gentle to fight back?
Please listen, keeping that girl here isn't right.
Such an inteligent and nice creature, I shall leave him alone.
You will try to convince the Beast.
Convinced the beast with theology and logic to let Belle free, end...
Nobody debates like [Root.GetFirstName]!
Die in duel, end...
...and they live happily ever after?
Win the duel, kill the beast, Belle is free...
Attacked by surprise, still has a small fight, kill the beast, Belle is free...
Nobody fights like [Root.GetFirstName]!
Nobody sneaks like [Root.GetFirstName]!
Blood of the Beast Slayer
Killing the Beast and saving Belle, made [This.GetTitledFirstName] one of the most respected warriors of [This.GetHerHis] age.
Head of the Beast
This is the head of the Beast, slain by [OriginalOwner.GetBestName].
